tool_description: The WHOIS Lookup API is a powerful, RESTful API that allows you to retrieve WHOIS information for any registered domain name. This API provides a simple and fast way to access detailed WHOIS data, including domain owner, registration date, expiration date, and more. Whether you're building a domain search tool, conducting research on domain ownership, or developing a new application that requires WHOIS data, this API is the perfect solution.
name: Domain WHOIS Lookup API
title: Domain WHOIS Lookup API

api_list.name: domain_name
api_list.description: Please provide the domain name for which you would like to retrieve WHOIS details.
